DOC.brief_summary: Patient with relapsing remitting multiple sclerosis taking avonex are included in this double blind randomized control trial. Simvastatin is compared to placebo. end points of edss , total attack, new enhancing lesion and newt2 lesion in mri is evaluated as end point.
DOC.brief_title: Simvastatin in Relapsing Remitting Multiple Sclerosis (RRMS) Patients Using Avonex Compared to Placebo
DOC.criteria: 1. edss<5 2. >=1 attack in last year 1. >2 attacks in study 2. drug complication
